fields.text: Welcome to Divvy Homes in San Francisco, where every payment brings you closer to owning your home.
For existing Divvy homeowners and current members, press [INDEX].
To make a payment or check your balance, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to Payments and Account Services.
For technical support or app assistance, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to Technical Support.
If you're new to Divvy and want to learn how we turn rent into home savings, press [INDEX].
To hear about our rent-to-own homeownership program, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we provide an overview of our homeownership program.
To speak with a sales representative, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a Sales Representative.
